revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Moon |image = |caption = An overhead map of the Mt. Moon. |tokens = 50 |location = East of [[Pewter City]], on Route 3, and 4 }} '''Mt. Moon''' is a dungeon in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | General || 834 || 4170 || 10 |}
===Pokémon===
* Sandshrew * Clefairy * Zubat * Paras * Geodude * Pidgeotto * Kabuto (boss) * Omanyte (boss)
